import React, { useState} from 'react'; const Post_Form = () => { const [hashtag, setHashtag]= useState([]); const addHashtag = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const h = document.getElementById("hashtag").value; let ht = hashtag ht.push(h); setHashtag(ht) } return (

Post ton Mood Mode

    { hashtag }
); } export default Post_Form;
